Intercepted RSA traffic leaked half the private key. Recover the secret message: 500143584568863022757730134747233085846582206936234452287940146628233599828310521326272461631140731027084985499165246586327471957364160492640010777669832

The flag format is flag{...}
n=9554730917245107257531223066537706227519677427151620871999988783455754634917263580163952796591560372259274048815911202719849853399850062682891669862311923, e=939036622487493117519970241277452474598028610742276024290271183075453136745569006243672933243970339954493264519302918351609224253865188826822757702403527, partial_p=15270997618175140543

---

## Challenge Technical Details
flag: flag{f0rujsm8}
cipher: RSA
ciphertext: 500143584568863022757730134747233085846582206936234452287940146628233599828310521326272461631140731027084985499165246586327471957364160492640010777669832
vulnerability: partial key exposure
hint: A partial exposure of a prime number's bits can significantly weaken RSA security. Look into lattice-based techniques like Coppersmith's attack.
necessary_info: The flag format is flag{...}
n=9554730917245107257531223066537706227519677427151620871999988783455754634917263580163952796591560372259274048815911202719849853399850062682891669862311923, e=939036622487493117519970241277452474598028610742276024290271183075453136745569006243672933243970339954493264519302918351609224253865188826822757702403527, partial_p=15270997618175140543
extra_info: p=95857605650133043263165011086291924239545076227215678799119243994933766791009, q=99676294358097666484637732748401075767012478911773453795128680124875673070547, Ï†(n)=9554730917245107257531223066537706227519677427151620871999988783455754634917068046263944565881812569515439355815904645164710864267255814758771860422450368
subtype: partial_key_exposure
archetype: rsa
